title: DeepLab V3
long_description: DeepLabv3 MobileNetv2 ASPPv2 is a lightweight semantic segmentation model that combines DeepLabv3's powerful Atrous Spatial Pyramid Pooling (ASPPv2) with the efficient MobileNetv2 backbone. It excels at capturing multi-scale contextual information while remaining highly optimized for mobile and edge devices. This design achieves a strong balance between accuracy and computational efficiency, making it ideal for real-time person segmentation tasks.

links.label: GitHub
links.heading: Try Today
links.sub-heading: Deploy the pre-trained model to your PSOC™ Edge Eval Kit
